languages.text: "Ты всегда был такой сентиментальной лапочкой. Такая привязанность к коллегам, такая привязанность к глазу и волосам... Прости, или это все еще больная тема?"
"You've always been so sentimental. So attached to your colleagues, your hair, your eyes... Oh, I'm sorry, is that still a sore point?"
languages.original_text: "Ты всегда был такой сентиментальной лапочкой. Такая привязанность к коллегам, такая привязанность к глазу и волосам... Прости, или это все еще больная тема?"

traits.locale_text: "You always was such a sentimental dear. Such loyalty to your colleagues, such attachment to your hair and eye... Oh, I'm sorry, is that still a sore point?"
"You always was such a sentimental dear. Such loyalty to your colleagues, such attachment to your hair and eye... Oh, I'm sorry, is that still a sore point?"
"You've always been such a sentimental sweetheart. Such loyalty to your colleagues, such attachment to the hair and eyes... Oh, I'm sorry, is that still a sore point?"
"You've always been such a sentimental sweetheart. Such loyalty to your colleagues, such attachment to the hair and eyes... Oh, I'm sorry, is that still a sore point?"
"You've always been so sentimental, a puppy dog. So attached to your colleagues, your hair, your eyes... Oh, I'm sorry, is that still a sore point?"
"You've always been so sentimental, a puppy dog. So attached to your colleagues, your hair, your eyes... Oh, I'm sorry, is that still a sore point?"
"You've always been so sentimental. So attached to your colleagues, your hair, your eyes... Oh, I'm sorry, is that still a sore point?"

languages.text: « Vous avez toujours été si sentimental. Si loyal envers vos collègues, si attaché à vos yeux et à vos cheveux... Oh, pardon, c'est encore un sujet sensible ? »
languages.original_text: "You've always been so sentimental. So attached to your colleagues, your hair, your eyes... Oh, I'm sorry, is that still a sore point?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez toujours été si sentimental. Si loyal envers vos collègues, si attaché à vos yeux et à vos cheveux... Oh, pardon, c'est encore un sujet sensible ? »

languages.text: «Siempre ha sido sensible. Esa lealtad por sus compañeros, su cabellera y sus ojos... Ay, disculpe, ¿aún sigue abierta esa herida?».
languages.original_text: "You've always been so sentimental. So attached to your colleagues, your hair, your eyes... Oh, I'm sorry, is that still a sore point?"

traits.locale_text: «Siempre ha sido sensible. Esa lealtad por sus compañeros, su cabellera y sus ojos... Ay, disculpe, ¿aún sigue abierta esa herida?».

languages.text: “还是像以前那么多愁善感。你对同事还是那么容易动感情，对头发和眼睛的事情也还是那么往心里去……哦，抱歉，这件事情还是会戳你的痛处吗？”
languages.original_text: "You've always been so sentimental. So attached to your colleagues, your hair, your eyes... Oh, I'm sorry, is that still a sore point?"

traits.locale_text: “你这个小可爱，还是像以前那么多愁善感。你对同事是如此忠诚，对头发和眼睛是如此迷恋……哦，抱歉，这件事情还是会戳你的痛处吗？”
“你这只小狗狗，还是像以前那么多愁善感。你对同事还是那么容易动感情，对头发和眼睛的事情也还是那么往心里去……哦，抱歉，这件事情还是会戳你的痛处吗？”

languages.text: 「あんたはいつだって感傷的なやつだったね。同僚や髪、目への愛着…ああ、すまない、まだ気にしてたのかい？」
languages.original_text: "You've always been so sentimental. So attached to your colleagues, your hair, your eyes... Oh, I'm sorry, is that still a sore point?"

traits.locale_text: 「あんたはいつだって感傷的なやつだったね。同僚や髪、目への愛着…ああ、すまない、まだ気にしてたのかい？」
「あんたは、いつだって感傷的な甘ちゃんだったね。同僚、髪や目への愛着…ああ、すまないね、まだ気にしてたのかい？」

languages.text: "Ihr wart immer so sentimental. Eure Kollegen waren Euch so wichtig, Eure Frisur, Eure Augen ... Oh, tut mir leid, ist das immer noch ein wunder Punkt?"
languages.original_text: "You've always been so sentimental. So attached to your colleagues, your hair, your eyes... Oh, I'm sorry, is that still a sore point?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wart schon immer so ein sentimentales Herzchen. Ihr warten Euren Kollegen gegenüber sehr loyal und hingt sehr an den Haaren und Augen ... Oh, verzeiht, ist das immer noch ein wunder Punkt?"
"Ihr wart immer so sentimental, wie ein Hundewelpen. Eure Kollegen waren Euch so wichtig, Eure Frisur, Eure Augen ... Oh, tut mir leid, ist das immer noch ein wunder Punkt?"

languages.text: "Sen zaten hep çok duygusaldın, yavru bir köpek gibi. Yoldaşlarına, saçına, gözüne çok bağlısın... Kusura bakma, yarana tuz mu bastım?"
languages.original_text: "You've always been so sentimental. So attached to your colleagues, your hair, your eyes... Oh, I'm sorry, is that still a sore point?"
